reviewText: I loved how the stories intertwined with each other and I love the all star cast. They were all the right ones for each part they played in this movie. It is a shame though that theses movies are not seen on the big screen.

I already had this movie on VHS, but I wanted to purchase it on DVD. I would say in a brief description that it is a movie about life's lessons. I especially liked how the characters intertwined in all of the stories(there are three). really good.

I first saw this movie on tv and knew then that I must own it.  This is very good trilolgy.  To watch three wonderful actors direct each other in these short films was just fantastic.  If you are a collector, this is a must own.
This is a very pleasant movie triology of Urban Life with great musical scores. It's a must see!!!
GREAT MOVIE!!!

New copy was purchased and received within a week.  Excellent movie to share this Valentine's Day with special loved ones or with family.  Also was able to purchase in a DVD format at a lower price than the VHS version.
Good movie!
i already saw this movie 3 times on tv, and now i finly got it on dvd....thank you amazon.com i love the story line...and louis gosset jr, and lyn whitfield,,what a cast.....lovie it alott......
I liked the whole way these stories inter-mingled with each other. Great stories & an excellent cast. A++
Wonderful DVD! I love it!
This is a great movie enjoyed enjoyed, i have it on vhs but wanted it on dvd great picture on dvd good quality great actors, actresses love all the stars, please buy you will enjoy it.
I thought this was a nice family movie to watch on the weekend when you have nothing to do and want to enjoy your down time.

Love Songs is a great movie--featuring three families dealing with situations in their lives. I believe you'll enjoy it.
I highly recommend it.
I love this dvd...The three short stories are heart warming and inspiring.. The actors involved are some of my favorites and I enjoyed watching them..

I watched this triad of stories years ago could never find it. Robert Townsend did an excellent job in writing these 3 stories that connect and overlap. My favorite story was  "A Love Song for Jean and Ellis."

My favorite Adam ant song is included here " Wonderful" and some other great hits like " Tonight I celebrate my love" by Roberta Flack and Peabo Bryson, I highly recommend this to all 80's music fans.
Okay movies! Great actors!
Great Movie please buy !!love it :)
Everything that my expectations thank you

Love it
Good movie!
